des:
With the Reality Home skill, smart home devices managed by Reality App canbe controlled with Amazon Alexa.

Reality Home Solutions including Smart Switches, Smart LED Light Bulbs, and Zigbee hub provides a perfect solution to retrofit the home with voice-activated intelligence.

Easy wire-free installation over your existing light switches, either toggle or rocker style.
Voice commands: turn lights on/off using your voice, with either Echo Plus or Wink Zigbee Hub. 
Can also be operated without voice or wireless connection, using the manual button.

Using ThirdReaity with Alexa is a easy way to control your RealitySwitch or other smart products. Steps to getting started:

1. Download ThirdReality App from Google Play Store or Apple AppStore.
2. Register and login.
3. Bind ThirdReality Mini hub or ThirdReality Voice to work as adapter.
4. Bind ThirdReality Switch, Light or other compatible third party smart home devices.
5. Eanble this skill and discover devices.
6. Use Alexa voice command to control these devices and have fun :) 


Here are some example commands:
"Alexa, turn on my switch 1."
"Alexa, lock the front door."
"Alexa, turn on the downstairs switch."

Visit https://www.3reality.com for a full list of Third Reality compatible products that works with Alexa.
